data.eml:eml: A revision of the Thyropygus allevatus group. Part 2: the T. bifurcus subgroup (Diplopoda, Spirostreptida, Harpagophoridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pimvichai, Piyatida, Enghoff, Henrik, Panha, Somsak (2009): A revision of the Thyropygus allevatus group. Part 2: the T. bifurcus subgroup (Diplopoda, Spirostreptida, Harpagophoridae). Zootaxa 2165: 1-15, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.189060
